pkgmetadata.longdescription: Retrieve App Data from 'OpenAppBuilder' // Provides an interface to connect R with the https://github.com/IDEMSInternational/open-app-builder 'OpenAppBuilder' platform, enabling users to retrieve and work with user and notification data for analysis and processing. It is designed for developers and analysts to seamlessly integrate data from 'OpenAppBuilder' into R workflows via a 'Postgres' database connection, allowing direct querying and import of app data into R.
